get.summary: Ping the solr server.

500.description: Internal server error. Additional details will be contained on the server logs.

get.summary: Gets all top level categories.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store ID.

parameters.name: depthAndLimit
parameters.description: The comma separated list of numbers is to control the depth of sub-categories and limit the number of items returned under each child category level. The first number in this list determines the maximum of categories (first level sub-categories) to be returned under the immediate child category. The second number in the list determines the maximum number of categories to be returned under the first level sub-categories. A value of "-1" implies no limit. In that case, only the first level categories will be returned. For example, "pageSize=4&limitSubCategories=-1,3,0,1" implies that there will be unlimited first level sub-categories under the immediate child categories.  Under these categories (up to 4), all sub-categories will be returned and a maximum of 3 second level sub-categories will be returned. There will be no third level or fourth level since the third level limit is 0. Any level after a limit of 0 will be ignored. By default, no sub-category will be returned if this parameter is not specified. When the asterisk "*" is specified, it is considered the same as "-1" but, any subsequent levels will also be treated "-1".

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The field name to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: The catalog identifier. If none is specified, the store default catalog shall be used.

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: The contractId

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code to use. Example usage : currency=USD. If no currency code is specified, the store default currency shall be used.

parameters.name: langId
parameters.description: Language identifier. If not specified, the "locale" parameter will be used. If "locale" isn't specified, then the store default language shall be used.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. Used to limit the amount of data returned by a query. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageNumber" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting at 1. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageSize" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: checkEntitlement
parameters.description: Option to force an entitlement check.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a search query.

400.description: Bad request. Some of the inputs provided to the request aren't valid.

401.description: Not authenticated. The user session isn't valid.

403.description: The user isn't authorized to perform the specified request.

404.description: The specified resource couldn't be found.

500.description: Internal server error. Additional details will be contained on the server logs.

Under these categories (up to 4), all sub-categories will be returned and a maximum of 3 second level sub-categories will be returned. By default, no sub-category will be returned if this parameter is not specified. get.summary: Finds a product by its ID.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store ID.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The category identifier.

parameters.name: associationType
parameters.description: The type of the merchandising association to be returned.

parameters.name: attributeKeyword
parameters.description: The attribute associated keywords to be returned.

parameters.name: facet
parameters.description: The selected facets.

parameters.name: facetLimit
parameters.description: The multiple name-value pairs of facet limit defining the maximum number of items to be returned under each facet. The sequence of limits honored alongside with the sequence of facet name-value pairs.

parameters.name: advancedFacetList
parameters.description: The advanced facet list.

parameters.name: filterFacet
parameters.description: The filter facet.

parameters.name: filterTerm
parameters.description: The filter term.

parameters.name: manufacturer
parameters.description: The manufacturer name.

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: The contractId

parameters.name: minPrice
parameters.description: The minimum price. Based on the selected currency.

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: The maximum price. Based on the selected currency.mc

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The field name to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: The search type is a numeric string with controls the query operator: ANY, OR, AND and control what data to be returned. For a detailed list of valid values, see the online documentation on Match type (_wcf.search.type). Known valid values include : 0: ANY (exclude SKU)1: EXACT (exclude SKU), 2: ALL (exclude SKU), 3: NONE (exclude SKU), 10: ANY (include SKU), 11: EXACT (include SKU), 12: ALL (include SKU), 13: NONE (include SKU), 100: ANY (only SKU), 101: EXACT (only SKU), 102: ALL (only SKU), 103: NONE (only SKU), 1000: ANY (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1001: EXACT (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1002: ALL (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1003: NONE (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 10000: ANY (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10001: EXACT (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10002: ALL (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10003: NONE (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU)

parameters.name: searchSource
parameters.description: The search source. The default is "N" for shallow search navigation. All other values will result in expanded search in sub-categories.

parameters.name: priceMode
parameters.description: The price mode.

parameters.name: checkEntitlement
parameters.description: Option to force an entitlement check.

parameters.name: attachementFilter
parameters.description: The attachment filter.

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: The catalog identifier. If none is specified, the store default catalog shall be used.

parameters.name: langId
parameters.description: Language identifier. If not specified, the "locale" parameter will be used. If "locale" isn't specified, then the store default language shall be used.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code to use. Example usage : currency=USD. If no currency code is specified, the store default currency shall be used.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. Used to limit the amount of data returned by a query. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageNumber" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting at 1. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageSize" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a search query.

400.description: Bad request. Some of the inputs provided to the request aren't valid.

401.description: Not authenticated. The user session isn't valid.

403.description: The user isn't authorized to perform the specified request.

404.description: The specified resource couldn't be found.

500.description: Internal server error. Additional details will be contained on the server logs.

parameters.name: searchSource
parameters.description: The search source. The default is "N" for shallow search navigation. All other values will result in expanded search in sub-categories.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. Used to limit the amount of data returned by a query. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageNumber" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: sequenceRule
parameters.description: The dynamic sequencing formula to be applied on the search results,

parameters.name: excludeIds
parameters.description: The list of product to be excluded from the search results , this is comma separated productId

parameters.name: debug

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting at 1. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageSize" must be specified for paging to work.

get.summary: Provides suggestions with type-ahead for search result page.

parameters.name: storeId

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of suggested keywords to be returned. The default value is 4.

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: The contractId

parameters.name: langId
parameters.description: Language identifier. If not specified, the "locale" parameter will be used. If "locale" isn't specified, then the store default language shall be used.

parameters.name: termsSort

parameters.name: catalogId

get.summary: Provides suggestions with type-ahead for search result page.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store ID.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: The search term.

parameters.name: suggestType
parameters.description: The custom suggestion type being requested.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of suggested keywords to be returned. The default value is 4.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. Used to limit the amount of data returned by a query. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageNumber" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: langId
parameters.description: Language identifier. If not specified, the "locale" parameter will be used. If "locale" isn't specified, then the store default language shall be used.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting at 1. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageSize" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: The search type is a numeric string with controls the query operator: ANY, OR, AND and control what data to be returned. For a detailed list of valid values, see the online documentation on Match type (_wcf.search.type). Known valid values include : 0: ANY (exclude SKU)1: EXACT (exclude SKU), 2: ALL (exclude SKU), 3: NONE (exclude SKU), 10: ANY (include SKU), 11: EXACT (include SKU), 12: ALL (include SKU), 13: NONE (include SKU), 100: ANY (only SKU), 101: EXACT (only SKU), 102: ALL (only SKU), 103: NONE (only SKU), 1000: ANY (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1001: EXACT (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1002: ALL (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1003: NONE (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 10000: ANY (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10001: EXACT (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10002: ALL (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10003: NONE (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU)

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: The contractId

parameters.name: termsSort
parameters.description: The sorting to be used in the returned result, "count" or "index". By default, it is "count".

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: The catalog identifier. If none is specified, the store default catalog shall be used.

403.description: The user isn't authorized to perform the specified request.

404.description: The specified resource couldn't be found.

get.summary: Search unstructured content details for search result page based on a search term.

parameters.description: The term to search for.

parameters.name: facet
parameters.description: The selected facets.

parameters.name: facetLimit
parameters.description: The multiple name-value pairs of facet limit defining the maximum number of items to be returned under each facet. The sequence of limits honored alongside with the sequence of facet name-value pairs.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The field name to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: The catalog identifier. If none is specified, the store default catalog shall be used.

parameters.description: Language identifier. If not specified, the "locale" parameter will be used. If "locale" isn't specified, then the store default language shall be used.
